sentences.english: You can find more information from the Service Directory in your room .
sentences.chinese: 您可以從您房間的服務指南中瞭解更多的資料。

sentences.english: In the meantime, most of the kinks have been worked out.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，操作指南的大部分內容也已經做出來了。

sentences.english: In this article we provide you with some common sense guidelines for setting your own portal governance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文將向您介紹設置門戶管理策略的一些常識性指南。

sentences.english: But are there any general guidelines for how long it takes before behaviours become automatic?
sentences.chinese: 但在行爲成爲自動性前有什麼普遍的指南嗎？

sentences.english: A simple compass is helpful for scribing the flowerpot cutouts.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單的指南針，是有助於劃線的花盆切口。

sentences.chinese: 本文提供了技術預覽版新功能的快速參考指南。

sentences.english: "When I've played I think I've done well, " he said, speaking to United's matchday programme.
sentences.chinese: “我覺得踢得不錯，”他在曼聯的觀賽指南中說。

sentences.english: USDA guidelines recommend three ounces or more of whole grains per day.
sentences.chinese: USDA指南中建議每天使用三盎司以上全穀類食品。

sentences.english: The Medication Guide will be considered to be an element of the REMS.

sentences.english: The Compass is also manufactured in Brazil and will furthermore be manufactured in Mexico and India.

sentences.english: The guide is available in PDF format for immediate download online.
sentences.chinese: 該指南以PDF格式提供，可直接在線下載。

sentences.chinese: 指南車是中國古代的一種機械定向裝置。

sentences.english: What kind of guidelines for low-income countries more appropriate?
sentences.chinese: 對於低收入國家哪種指南更合適？
